Finger Exercise Lecture 10 Implement the function that meets the specifications below:
def all_true(n, Lf): """ n is an int Lf is a list of functions that take in an int and return a Boolean Returns True if each and every function in Lf returns True when called with n as a parameter. Otherwise returns False. """ # Your code here # Examples: all_true() # prints 6 6.100L Finger Exercises Lecture 10 Solutions
